title: 75+ Hilarious Pirate Jokes, Puns, & One Liners

steps.title: Why is a pirate’s life so addictive?
steps.content: Why is a pirate’s life so addictive? Because once you lose a hand, you get hooked.

steps.title: How much did the pirate pay for their piercings?
steps.content: How much did the pirate pay for their piercings? A buccaneer.

steps.title: What kind of sweaters to pirates wear?
steps.content: What kind of sweaters to pirates wear? Arrrrgyle.

steps.title: What did the pirate say when his wooden leg got stuck in the freezer?
steps.content: What did the pirate say when his wooden leg got stuck in the freezer? Shiver me timbers!

steps.title: Why did the pirate join a gym?
steps.content: Why did the pirate join a gym? He wanted a better booty.

steps.title: What has 8 legs, 8 arms, and 8 eyes?
steps.content: What has 8 legs, 8 arms, and 8 eyes? 8 pirates.

steps.title: What’s the difference between a hungry pirate and a drunken pirate?
steps.content: What’s the difference between a hungry pirate and a drunken pirate? One has a rumbling tummy, and the other’s a tumbling rummy.

steps.title: Why can you never call a pirate on the phone?
steps.content: Why can you never call a pirate on the phone? Because he left it off the hook.

steps.title: Why did the pirate become a chef?
steps.content: Why did the pirate become a chef? Because he mastered the arrrrh-t of cooking.

steps.title: Why are pirates afraid of boxing?
steps.content: Why are pirates afraid of boxing? They don’t want to get a hook in the ring.

steps.title: Why do pirates take so long to learn the alphabet?
steps.content: Why do pirates take so long to learn the alphabet? Because they spend most of their lives at C.

steps.title: Where do you go to the bathroom on a ship with no toilet?
steps.content: Where do you go to the bathroom on a ship with no toilet? The poop deck.

steps.title: Where did Captain Hook get his hook?
steps.content: Where did Captain Hook get his hook? At a second-hand store.

steps.title: Why couldn’t the kid go to the pirate movie?
steps.content: Why couldn’t the kid go to the pirate movie? Because it was rated ARRRH!

steps.title: Why couldn’t the pirates play cards?
steps.content: Why couldn’t the pirates play cards? Because the captain was standing on the deck.

steps.title: What do you call a pirate with three eyes?
steps.content: What do you call a pirate with three eyes? A pi-i-irate.

steps.title: What’s a pirate’s favorite vegetable?
steps.content: What’s a pirate’s favorite vegetable? An arrrrr-tichoke.

steps.title: What does a pirate’s dog say?
steps.content: What does a pirate’s dog say? Arrrrrr-f.

steps.title: What do you call a pirate who likes to skip school?
steps.content: What do you call a pirate who likes to skip school? Captain Hook-y.

steps.title: What’s a pirate’s favorite subject in school?
steps.content: What’s a pirate’s favorite subject in school? Arrrr-t.

steps.title: Where does a pirate keep his buccaneers?
steps.content: Where does a pirate keep his buccaneers? Under his buccan hat.

steps.title: What do you call a pirate with both eyes and 2 legs?
steps.content: What do you call a pirate with both eyes and 2 legs? A rookie.

steps.title: What is a pirate’s favorite lobbying organization?
steps.content: What is a pirate’s favorite lobbying organization? A.A.R.P.

steps.title: How do pirates know they exist?
steps.content: How do pirates know they exist? They think therefore they arrrrrh.

steps.title: Where can you find a pirate who lost his wooden leg?
steps.content: Where can you find a pirate who lost his wooden leg? Right where you left him.

steps.title: Where did the one-legged pirate go for breakfast?
steps.content: Where did the one-legged pirate go for breakfast? I-HOP.

steps.title: What’s a pirate’s favorite musical instrument?
steps.content: What’s a pirate’s favorite musical instrument? A guit-arrrrh.

steps.title: Why did the pirate put on a suit and tie?
steps.content: Why did the pirate put on a suit and tie? He had a cor-pirate meeting.

steps.title: What’s a pirate’s least favorite exercise?
steps.content: What’s a pirate’s least favorite exercise? The plank.

steps.title: Why were the pirate’s eyes red?
steps.content: Why were the pirate’s eyes red? He had too much seaweed.

steps.title: Why did the pirate’s wife leave him?
steps.content: Why did the pirate’s wife leave him? He was getting too salty.

steps.title: Why was the pirate sad when his parrot flew away?
steps.content: Why was the pirate sad when his parrot flew away? It gave him the cold shoulder.

steps.title: What do you call a pirate obsessed with drinking seawater?
steps.content: What do you call a pirate obsessed with drinking seawater? An aqua-holic.

steps.title: What’s a pirate’s favorite fast-food restaurant?
steps.content: What’s a pirate’s favorite fast-food restaurant? Arrrrrh-by’s.

steps.title: Where does a pirate part his car?
steps.content: Where does a pirate part his car? In the parrrrrh-king lot.

steps.title: Why can’t pirates say the alphabet?
steps.content: Why can’t pirates say the alphabet? Because they insist there are 7 seas.

steps.title: What’s a pirate’s favorite movie?
steps.content: What’s a pirate’s favorite movie? The kind that be rated ARRRRH.

steps.title: How much did the pirate pay for his peg leg and hook?
steps.content: How much did the pirate pay for his peg leg and hook? An arm and a leg.

steps.title: What do you call a pirate mutiny?
steps.content: What do you call a pirate mutiny? A conspira-sea.

steps.title: How did the pirate get such a good price on his ship?
steps.content: How did the pirate get such a good price on his ship? He bought it on sail.

steps.title: What do pirates wear in the winter?
steps.content: What do pirates wear in the winter? Long johns.

steps.title: What did the pirate wear on Halloween?
steps.content: What did the pirate wear on Halloween? A pumpkin patch.

steps.title: Why do people become pirates?
steps.content: Why do people become pirates? Pier pressure.

steps.title: What did the pirates see when they looked in the toilet?
steps.content: What did the pirates see when they looked in the toilet? The captain's log.

steps.title: Why don’t pirates go to strip clubs?
steps.content: Why don’t pirates go to strip clubs? Because they already have all the booty.

steps.title: Why was the pirate movie rated R?
steps.content: Why was the pirate movie rated R? Too much booty.

steps.title: What does a pirate use a cell phone for?
steps.content: What does a pirate use a cell phone for? Booty calls.

steps.title: Why did Captain Hook die?
steps.content: Why did Captain Hook die? He had jock itch.

steps.title: How does a pirate tell his wench he’s in the mood?
steps.content: How does a pirate tell his wench he’s in the mood? Drop yer sails and prepare to be boarded!

steps.title: Why do pirates make bad husbands?
steps.content: Why do pirates make bad husbands? They’re always after someone else’s booty.

steps.title: What’s a horny pirate’s worst nightmare?
steps.content: What’s a horny pirate’s worst nightmare? A sunken chest and no booty.

steps.title: What does a pirate say when he turns 80?
steps.content: What does a pirate say when he turns 80? Aye matey!

steps.title: What did the sea say to the pirate?
steps.content: What did the sea say to the pirate? Nothing. It just waved.

steps.title: Why are they called pirates?
steps.content: Why are they called pirates? Because they arrrrh!

steps.title: Why do pirates bury their treasure 18 inches under the ground?
steps.content: Why do pirates bury their treasure 18 inches under the ground? Because booty is only shin deep.

steps.title: How did the pirate find out he needed glasses?
steps.content: How did the pirate find out he needed glasses? He took an aye exam.

steps.title: Why did the pirate put a chicken on top of his treasure chest?
steps.content: Why did the pirate put a chicken on top of his treasure chest? Because eggs marks the spot.

steps.title: Why wouldn’t the pirate fight the octopus?
steps.content: Why wouldn’t the pirate fight the octopus? It was too well-armed.

steps.title: Why can’t pirates fire their weapons on Saturdays?
steps.content: Why can’t pirates fire their weapons on Saturdays? They only cannon Sundays.

steps.title: What’s a pirate’s favorite music genre?
steps.content: What’s a pirate’s favorite music genre? Arrrrrh & B.

steps.title: What happened when Bluebeard fell into the Red Sea?
steps.content: What happened when Bluebeard fell into the Red Sea? He got marooned.

steps.title: Why don’t pirates shower before they walk the plank?
steps.content: Why don’t pirates shower before they walk the plank? Because they’ll just wash up on shore later.

steps.title: How do you make a pirate mad?
steps.content: How do you make a pirate mad? Take away the “p.”

steps.title: How do pirates like to communicate?
steps.content: How do pirates like to communicate? Aye to aye.

steps.title: What kind of phone does a pirate have?
steps.content: What kind of phone does a pirate have? An aye phone.

steps.title: Why are pirates so healthy?
steps.content: Why are pirates so healthy? A high dose of vitamin sea.

steps.title: Why do pirates love binge-watching shows?
steps.content: Why do pirates love binge-watching shows? They get hooked.

steps.title: What do you call a selfish pirate?
steps.content: What do you call a selfish pirate? Extremely arrrrh-ogant.

steps.title: Why are pirates the best singers?
steps.content: Why are pirates the best singers? They hit the high seas.

steps.title: Why did the pirate go on vacation?
steps.content: Why did the pirate go on vacation? He needed a little arrrrh and arrrrh.

steps.title: Why are pirates able to live life to the fullest?
steps.content: Why are pirates able to live life to the fullest? They know how to seas the day.

steps.title: Why did the pirate’s ship sink?
steps.content: Why did the pirate’s ship sink? Because he couldn’t sea the problem.

steps.title: Why wouldn’t the pirates let the skeleton on their ship?
steps.content: Why wouldn’t the pirates let the skeleton on their ship? They said he didn’t have the guts.

steps.title: A pirate walks into a bar.
steps.content: A pirate walks into a bar. The barkeeper looks at him and says, “Where did you get that peg leg, hook hand, and eye patch? The pirate says, “T’was a run of bad luck, for certain. First, I fell overboard, and a shark bit off me leg. After I got me peg leg, I fell onto me bottle of rum and cut off me hand. Then, I looked up when I was walking on the deck, and a gull pooped in me eye.” The barkeeper says, “Gull poop took out your eye?” The pirate shakes his head. “T’was me first day with the hook.”

steps.title: A pirate walks into a bar with a big ship’s wheel down his pants.
steps.content: A pirate walks into a bar with a big ship’s wheel down his pants. The bartender says, “Excuse me, sir. Do you know you have a ship’s wheel in your pants?” The pirate replies, “Aye, it’s drivin’ me nuts.”

steps.title: A pirate walks into a bar with a paper towel on his head.
steps.content: A pirate walks into a bar with a paper towel on his head. The barkeeper takes one look at him and says, “What’s with the paper towel?” The pirate replies, “I’ve got a bounty on me head!”

steps.title: A pirate walks into the bar with a mangey, one-eyed parrot on his shoulder.
steps.content: A pirate walks into the bar with a mangey, one-eyed parrot on his shoulder. The barkeeper says, “You really shouldn’t bring that disgusting thing in here.” The pirate says, “He’s had his shots!” The barkeeper says, “I was talking to the parrot.”
